name: Hospice Wellington
comment:
Companionship, respite care, and emotional support to people and their family/caregivers dealing with a life-threatening illness * bereavement support for anyone who has experienced the death of someone close * services can be provided at home, or in hospitals and long-term care homes

Programs include:
  • grief education workshops
  • advance care planning (ACP) education program
  • hospice wellington ambassador program


Services and Programs:
  • Caregiver Support
  • Palliative Support

Companionship, respite care, and emotional support to people and their family/caregivers dealing with a life-threatening illness * bereavement support for anyone who has experienced the death of someone close * services can be provided at home, or in hospitals and long-term care homes

Programs include:
